verses.verse: May <S%H430>God<s%> be <S%H2603>merciful<s%> to <S%H1288>us,<s%> bless <S%H6440>us,<s%> and cause his face to <S%H215>shine<s%> on <S%H5542>us.<s%> Selah.
That your <S%H1870>way<s%> may be <S%H3045>known<s%> on <S%H776>earth,<s%> and your <S%H3444>salvation<s%> among all <S%H1471>nations,<s%>
let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>you,<s%> God. Let all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> praise <S%H3034>you.<s%>

Oh let the <S%H3816>nations<s%> be <S%H8055>glad<s%> and sing for <S%H7442>joy,<s%> for you will <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> with <S%H4334>equity,<s%> and <S%H5148>govern<s%> the <S%H3816>nations<s%> on <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
Let the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> <S%H3034>praise<s%> <S%H430>you,<s%> God. Let all the <S%H5971>peoples<s%> praise <S%H3034>you.<s%>
The <S%H776>earth<s%> has <S%H5414>yielded<s%> its <S%H2981>increase.<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> even our own <S%H430>God,<s%> will bless <S%H1288>us.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H1288>bless<s%> <S%H657>us.<s%> All the ends of the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall fear <S%H3372>him.<s%>
